verses.esv:
17     learn to do good;
  seek justice,
    correct oppression;
  bring justice to the fatherless,
    plead the widow’s cause.
verses.kjv: 17 Learn to do well; seek judgment, relieve the oppressed, judge the fatherless, plead for the widow.
verses.niv: 17 learn to do right! Seek justice, encourage the oppressed. Defend the cause of the fatherless, plead the case of the widow.

verses.esv: 32 “You shall stand up before the gray head and honor the face of an old man, and you shall fear your God: I am the LORD.
verses.kjv: 32 Thou shalt rise up before the hoary head, and honour the face of the old man, and fear thy God: I am the LORD.
verses.niv: 32 "'Rise in the presence of the aged, show respect for the elderly and revere your God. I am the LORD.
